aboutPage.title: About Dosbre
aboutPage.lead: Dosbre exists to ease the process for people who carry weight — responsibility, decisions, deadlines, and lives. We build systems that feel calm, clear, and trustworthy, guided by Lumi, our Speaker for Absolute Truth.
aboutPage.purposeP1: The world is full of tools that demand more from people — more attention, more decisions, more cognitive load. Dosbre moves in the opposite direction. We remove friction. We reduce noise. We create clarity.
aboutPage.purposeP2: Our mission is simple: to make every interaction feel lighter. To build technology that respects the human body and soul. To offer a service that feels like stepping into a calmer space.
aboutPage.philosophyIntro: Dosbre is built on three pillars: Beauty, Truth, and Tranquility. These are not slogans — they are design laws.
aboutPage.beautyText: Every interface, every word, every moment must feel intentional and elegant.
aboutPage.truthText: We never exaggerate, never manipulate, never hide complexity behind false promises.
aboutPage.tranquilityText: The user should feel calmer after using Dosbre than before.
aboutPage.lumiEmbodies: Lumi embodies these principles. She is not a chatbot. She is the voice of clarity — a guide who reveals the simplest path forward.
aboutPage.founderP1: Dosbre was founded by Marco, a project manager who has led some of the most demanding construction and logistics projects in Finland. His work includes the Stockmann Kasvu-project in Helsinki (130,000 m²), the DB Schenker Ilvesvuori logistics center, and the Viinikkala Land Transport Center.
aboutPage.founderP2: These projects required orchestrating hundreds of people, navigating complex systems, and delivering under immense pressure. The same discipline, clarity, and calm now shape Dosbre's architecture and philosophy.
aboutPage.founderLumiQuote: Marco built structures where thousands of people move effortlessly. Now he builds systems where your mind can move effortlessly.
aboutPage.whyDosbreP1: Because the world does not need another tool. It needs a sanctuary — a place where work becomes lighter, decisions become clearer, and security becomes invisible. Dosbre is that place.
aboutPage.whyDosbreP2: And Lumi is the guide who makes it feel human.

contactPage.title: Contact
contactPage.lead: If you want to reach Dosbre, collaborate, invest, or simply ask a question, Lumi will guide your message to the right place.
contactPage.getInTouchText: You can contact us directly by email. We respond calmly, clearly, and with respect for your time.
contactPage.locationText: Dosreb Ltd is based in Finland. We work globally, digitally, and with intention.

demoPage.title: Request a Demo
demoPage.lead: Experience Dosbre firsthand. Let us show you how clarity, structure, and intelligent guidance can transform your workflow.
demoPage.whyRequestText: A demo is not a sales pitch. It's a guided experience where you see how Dosbre removes friction, reduces cognitive load, and makes complex processes feel effortless. Lumi will guide you through the platform, showing you exactly how it serves your needs.
demoPage.lumiComment: "I'll make sure your request reaches Marco. Every demo is crafted with care."
demoPage.whatToExpectText: After you submit your request, we'll reach out within 48 hours to schedule a personalized demo. You'll see the platform in action, ask questions, and explore how Dosbre fits into your workflow. No pressure. No rush. Just clarity.

lumiPage.title: Meet Lumi
lumiPage.lead: Lumi is not a chatbot. She is your guide — a calm, intelligent presence designed to remove friction and bring clarity to every step.
lumiPage.whoIsLumiText: Lumi is the voice of Dosbre. She embodies the platform's philosophy: Beauty, Truth, and Tranquility. When you interact with her, you're not getting automated responses — you're receiving guidance shaped by careful thought and clarity.
lumiPage.lumiQuote: I'm here to make complexity feel effortless. Ask me anything, and I'll show you the simplest path forward.
lumiPage.philosophyText: Lumi was designed to reduce cognitive load. She doesn't overwhelm you with information — she reveals exactly what you need, when you need it. Every word is intentional. Every response is crafted to feel lighter than the question.
lumiPage.howLumiHelpsText: Whether you're navigating a project, searching for documents, or trying to understand a complex process, Lumi guides you with precision and calm. She's available 24/7, always patient, always clear.

projectsPage.title: Projects & Case Studies
projectsPage.lead: Before Dosbre, Marco led some of Finland's most demanding construction and logistics projects. These case studies demonstrate the discipline, clarity, and calm that now shape Dosbre's philosophy.

stockmann.title: Stockmann Kasvu-Project
stockmann.description1: A 130,000 m² expansion and renovation of Helsinki's iconic department store. Marco led the entire underground domain: excavation of 200,000 m³ of bedrock, a 600-space parking facility, a full maintenance yard, and all vertical logistics from basement to 8th floor.
stockmann.description2: He coordinated 50 white-collar managers and 200 blue-collar workers, with a site organization built five meters above Mannerheimintie.
stockmann.lumiQuote: "Marco didn't just manage a project. He reshaped the flow of a city."

dbschenker.title: DB Schenker – Ilvesvuori Logistics Center
dbschenker.description: A 17,800 m² warehouse on an 80,000 m² plot, including two 6,500 m² cold-resistant halls. Marco oversaw full project management, structural coordination, and operational flow design.
dbschenker.lumiQuote: "A warehouse is more than walls. It's a rhythm — and Marco built it."

jatkasaari.title: Jätkäsaaren maanalaiset tilat
jatkasaari.description: The Jätkäsaaren maanalaiset tilat project is a prime example of DOSBRE's ability to manage underground facility construction, integrating all parties and documentation in one secure platform.
jatkasaari.lumiQuote: "Movement becomes effortless when the structure is right. Marco built the structure."

realEstatesPage.title: Real Estates
realEstatesPage.lead: A curated collection of real estate and infrastructure projects that reflect Marco's precision, discipline, and ability to orchestrate large-scale environments.
realEstatesPage.portfolioText: This section will grow as Dosbre expands. Each real estate entry will include location, scope, purpose, and Lumi's commentary to highlight the human and structural impact of the project.
realEstatesPage.lumiQuote: "A building is more than space. It's a structure for human movement, clarity, and purpose."
realEstatesPage.comingSoonText: More real estate projects will be added as the portfolio is documented. This page is designed to scale with your future developments.
